1501708949896450050.name: juliettech.eth
1501708949896450050.content: 6) Crypto is an anon-friendly space and anon-friendly spaces have historically been hostile to women (think Reddit, 4chan). Women tend to use their real names and images on Discord/Twitter more often than men in the space.

1501708947182346243.name: juliettech.eth
1501708947182346243.content:
4) Crypto is a combination of tech and finance, two industries that have been traditionally very male-dominated.

5) 80% of women said they refrain from discussing finances, even with close friends and family. Guys doing this get other guys to get into it.

1501708944967929858.name: juliettech.eth
1501708944967929858.content:
2) The "crypto bro" narrative is a self-fulfilling prophecy. Women don't feel like they fit in.

3) Women have been socialized to take less risks and studies suggest we are more risk averse. At the same time, crypto can be a financial and emotional roller coaster. Those dont mix.
